Title: Directs the department of health to establish and implement an infection inspection audit and checklist on residential care facilities, nursing homes and long-term care facilities
Summary: Directs the department of health to establish and implement an infection inspection audit and checklist on residential care facilities, nursing homes and long-term care facilities.
ActClause: AN ACT directing the department of health to establish and implement an infection inspection audit and checklist on residential care facilities, nursing homes and long-term care facilities
